title: Login Issues - Can't Access Account
description: Customer is unable to log in even after multiple password reset attempts.

title: Payment Failed
description: Customer's card keeps declining although the bank confirms no issue.

title: Error While Uploading Files
description: User reports receiving a 'File format not supported' error on valid files.

title: App Freezing Frequently
description: Mobile app keeps freezing after the latest update.

title: Unable to Update Profile Info
description: Customer cannot update their phone number or email address.

title: Notification Not Received
description: Push notifications are not appearing on Android devices.

title: Password Reset Email Not Sent
description: Customer requested password reset but didn't receive any email.

title: Wrong Billing Amount
description: Customer is charged twice for the same month.

title: Slow Website Performance
description: Website takes more than 10 seconds to load dashboard.

title: Feature Request - Dark Mode
description: Customer requests a dark mode for better night usability.

title: Account Suspended by Mistake
description: User reports their account is suspended without violating policies.

title: Email Not Verifying
description: Verification link redirects to an error page.

title: Cannot Download Invoice
description: User receives a 404 error when downloading invoices.

title: Two-Factor Authentication Not Working
description: Authentication code is not accepted even though it's correct.

title: Bug in Dashboard Analytics
description: Analytics data is showing incorrect numbers.
